summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 MAZDA MAZDA3. THE CONTACT STATED THAT NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V082000 (SEATS) EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT STATED SHE RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION OVER 2 MONTHS AGO. THE DEALER ( FIVE STAR MAZDA 3068 RIVERSIDE DR, MACON GA, 31210) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR REPAIR TO CALL BACK IN A FEW MONTHS, WHEN THE CONTACT CALLED BACK IN JULY SHE WAS INFORMED PARTS WERE STILL UNAVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED OR MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
